EmailInputEdit:
With this, you should no longer experience any connection issues.

Additionally,  to prevent performance issues in the future, we recommend shutting down your computer every night and ensuring it remains connected during the scanning process.
Issue: the Company ID Token error in your 3Shape Unite software
Probing Questions (Add Info):
How long has been Happening this issue?
Have you done an update on the software?
Have anything changed on the network or the commputer lin the last days?
Do you have more scanners?
How many computer do you use?
RC: an internal bug in the system, which has been reported to our backend team. They are working on fixing it as soon as possible.
Solution: performing an internal system reset of the server settings. Your computer has also been rebooted to ensure these settings are correctly updated.
Step 1: Went on CMD and ran the command (sc delete MigrationService) in order to delete the migration service
Step 2: Went on path C:\Program Files\3Shape\Dental Desktop and deleted the MigrationToRaven file
Step 3: Went on Regedit on path: Computer\HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\3Shape\DentalDesktop\MigrationToRavenStatus and the value in the registry was changed from 8 to 0
Step 5: Went on path: C:\ProgramData\3Shape\DentalDesktop\ServerPackages and ran a repair installation of the DentalDesktopSetup.exe
Step 6: Signed in again with the 3shape account & password
Step 7: Issue solved no further assistance needed
